這 次 你 輸 了 ， 不 過 別 擔 心 。 仔 細 遵 循 說 明 ， 下 次 你 會 做 得 更 好 。 按 'Tab' 鍵 返 回 選 單 ， 您 可 以 在 其 中 重 試 本 教 程 。

在 本 教 程 中，您 將 學 習 運 動 和 戰 鬥 的 基 礎 知 識。在 Mount&Blade中，您 使 用 滑 鼠 控 制 您 要 查 看 的 位 置，並 使 用 鍵 盤 上 的 'W，A，S，D' 鍵 移 動。你 在 訓 練 中 的 第 一 個 任 務 是 找 到 房 間 裏 的 旗 子並 移 到 上 面。您 可 以 隨 時 按 'Tab' 鍵 退 出 本 教 程 或 退 出 遊 戲 中 的 任 何 其 他區 域。現 在 去 旗 子 那 裡。
做得好。下一步我們將用武器掩護進攻。在本教程中，您已經裝備了弓和箭、劍和盾牌。你可以使用滑鼠滾輪從武器槽中取出不同的武器。在默認配寘中，向上滾動會拉出你的下一個武器，向下滾動會拉出你的盾牌。如果你已經拿著一個盾牌，向下滾動將把你的盾牌收起來。現在試著用滾輪改變你的裝備。準備好後，轉到標記以繼續執行下一個任務。
傑出的。本教程的下一部分將介紹如何使用近戰武器進行攻擊。你用滑鼠左鍵攻擊當前使用的武器。按住按鈕準備攻擊，然後釋放按鈕進行攻擊。如果你在釋放前按住滑鼠左鍵一段時間，你的攻擊將更加强大。現在拔出你的劍，摧毀房間裏的四個假人。
幹得好！你毀了所有四個假人。你現在可以去下一個房間了。
如你所見，房間的另一邊有一個射箭靶。你的下一個任務是用弓把三支箭射入目標。按下並按住滑鼠左鍵以切出箭頭。然後，您可以通過釋放滑鼠左鍵來觸發箭頭。注意荧幕中央的瞄準網，它顯示了你的射擊精度。為了達到最佳的精度，讓你的箭在最小的時候飛。現在試著射擊目標。
做得好！ 你已經學會了移動和攻擊的基礎知識。通過一些練習，你很快就會掌握它們。在第二個教程中，您可以學習更高級的戰鬥技能並面對武裝對手。 您可以隨時按'Tab'鍵返回教程菜單。
本教程將教你如何用盾牌保衛自己以及如何與武裝對手作戰。現在你只帶著一個盾牌。你的任務不是攻擊，而是用盾牌成功保護自己免受傷害。在下一個房間裡有一個武裝的對手在等你。他會盡力讓你失去意識，而你必須按住鼠標右鍵來保護自己。現在進入下一個房間面對你的對手。請記住，您可以隨時按'Tab'鍵退出本教程或退出遊戲中的任何其他區域。
按 住 鼠 標 右 鍵 抬 起 盾 牌 。 盡 量 保 持 站 立 三 十 秒 。   你 有 {reg3} 秒 。
幹 得 好 ， 你 成 功 地 防 禦 了 武 裝 對 手 。 本 教 程 的 下 一 階 段 將 使 用 你 的 盾 牌 對 抗 敵 人 弓 箭 手 的 力 量 。   當 你 準 備 面 對 弓 箭 手 時 ， 轉 移 到 下 一 個 房 間 。
用 鼠 標 右 鍵 抬 起 盾 牌 ， 保 護 自 己 不 受 箭 頭 傷 害 。 盡 量 保 持 站 立 三 十 秒 。 你 有 {reg3} 秒 。

在 默 認 配 置 中 ， 鍵 盤 上 的 'F' 鍵 用 於 與 遊 戲 世 界 中 的 對 象 和 人 進 行 互 動 。 要 拿 起 祭 壇 上 的 劍 ， 看 它 ， 當 你 看 到 “裝備” 這 個 詞 時 按 'F' 。
一 個 好 武 器 ！ 現 在 你 可 以 用 它 來 復 仇 。 回 到 門 口 ， 處 理 你 之 前 遇 到 的 弓 箭 手 。
很 好 。 在 完 成 本 教 程 之 前 ， 您 的 最 後 一 個 任 務 是 面 對 護 衛 。 現 在 穿 過 門 ， 向 他 展 示 你 的 武 器 ！
恭喜！ 你現在已經學會瞭如何用盾牌來保衛自己，甚至是第一次嘗試與武裝對手戰鬥。\n給它一點練習，你很快就會成為一名著名的劍客。\n下一個教程涵蓋了定向防禦，這是Mount＆Blade戰鬥中最重要的元素之一。您可以隨時按'Tab'鍵返回教程菜單。

本教程旨在為您提供一個沒有盾牌的招架和防禦概述。
用你的武器招架攻擊比用盾牌阻擋要困難一些。
當你用武器防禦時，你只受到一個方向的保護，即你的武器被設定的方向。
如果你向上阻擋，你會避開任何頭頂上的擺動，但是你不會阻止向你身體兩側的推力或攻擊。這些攻擊中的任何一個都能擊中你。
這就是為什麼，為了在沒有盾牌的情況下生存，你必須學會定向防守。現在去拿起斧頭開始練習。

默認情況下，您防守的方向(通過單擊並按住鼠標右鍵)取決於最近對手的攻擊方向。
例如，如果你的對手正在準備一個推力攻擊，按住鼠標右鍵將招架推力攻擊，但不會從側面或頭頂攻擊。
你必須仔細觀察你的對手，並在敵人開始攻擊後才開始你的攻擊。如果你在他準備攻擊之前開始，你可能會完全用錯誤的方式閃避！
現在是時候讓你進入下一個房間，在那裡你必須保護自己免受武裝對手的攻擊。
你的任務是成功保護自己30秒，除了簡單的斧頭之外沒有任何設備。本教程禁用了你的斧頭攻擊，所以不要擔心攻擊並專注於你的防禦。
 準備開始戰鬥時，請轉到下一個房間。
在對手開始攻擊後，按住鼠標右鍵以用斧頭保護自己。\n盡量保持站立三十秒。 你有{reg3}秒。
幹得好，你已經成功完成了這次試驗！\n現在你將與一個更具挑戰性的對手進行對抗，這將使你的事情變得更加困難。\n當你準備面對他時，繼續前往下一個房間。
在對手開始攻擊後，按住鼠標右鍵以用斧頭保護自己。\n盡量保持站立三十秒。 你有{reg3}秒。
在對手開始攻擊後，按住鼠標右鍵以用斧頭保護自己。\n盡量保持站立三十秒。 你有{reg3}秒。
你的斧頭攻擊再次啟用。\n你的第一個對手正在隔壁房間等候。\n通過攻擊和防禦的組合擊敗他。
用你的斧頭擊敗你的對手。
精彩。 現在唯一阻擋你的是最後一個對手。\n他在隔壁房間。 進去打倒他。
用 你 的 斧 頭 擊 敗 你 的 對 手 。
做得好！ 在本教程中，您已經學會瞭如何在沒有盾牌的情況下進行戰鬥。 \n努力訓練，訓練好，沒有人能夠擊中你。 \n在下一個教程中，您可以學習騎馬和騎兵作戰。 您可以隨時按'Tab'鍵返回教程菜單。
歡迎來到第四個教程。 在這個序列中，您將學習如何騎馬/座狼以及如何在馬背上進行各種軍事演習。\n我們首先要讓你上馬。 接近馬，當看到"騎乘"字樣時按'F'鍵。
在馬背上，'WASD'鍵控制你的馬的方向，騎上你的馬跑而不是自己跑，並嘗試沿著球場周圍的旗幟。\n當你到達旗幟時，它將移動到下一個航點，直到你到達終點。
很好。 接下來我們將介紹來自馬背的攻擊敵人。\n現在接近旗幟。
拔出你的劍(使用鼠標滾輪)並摧毀四個目標。\n嘗試在完全馳騁時擊中假人 - 這提供了額外的挑戰，但是額外的速度增加了你的打擊敵人時獲得更多的傷害。 最簡單的方法是按住鼠標左鍵直到合適的時刻，在你通過目標之前方開它。
非常精采。 現在讓我們嘗試一些馬背射擊目標。\n現在靠近旗幟。
找到騎行路線旁邊的射箭目標並用弓箭射擊三次。\n雖然您不需要在射擊時跑動，但建議您嘗試以各種速度和角度擊中目標，以了解您的馬的速度和航向如何影響您的目標。
恭喜，您已完成本教程。\n您可以隨時按'Tab'鍵返回教程菜單。
歡迎來到第五個也是最後一個教程，它簡要概述瞭如何在戰鬥中指揮部隊\n這是Mount＆Blade中最重要的一個方面。^^你需要學習的第一個命令菜單是移動命令，它可以按'F1'鍵即可找到。\n現在按下它，探索你可以在戰鬥中給予部隊的許多運動選項。^^第一步，命令你的部隊跟隨你，向旗幟和指針所在的山上移動。

精彩。 你的部隊跟著你上山了。現在你可以很好地了解戰場了。^^
這次，再次按下'F1'指令菜單，選擇'F1'保持這個位置，讓你的部隊抓住這座山。^^完成後，你會注意到 你的部隊停止走動並保持你要求他們的位置。^^
這是學習第二個命令菜單的好時機，它圍繞著部隊的基本編隊。^^
這個菜單可以讓你指揮你的部隊加強隊伍陣型 ，以阻止步兵衝鋒，或分散以抵抗弓箭手射擊。^^
使用此命令菜單命令你的部隊向前或向後移動十步，允許你的部隊在保持陣型的同時移動。^^
在探索了不同的選擇後，將部隊保持在這座小山上，一個人朝著對面的小山移動，那裡有旗幟和指針。
如你所見，你的步兵正在你所要求的地方。\n現在，向你的風車走去。

現在你有弓箭手加入你的命令。在Mount＆Blade中，你可以給步兵，弓箭手和騎兵等特定部隊分別發出命令。^^
按數字鍵將選擇您選擇的分區(1為步兵，2為弓箭手，3為騎兵)。然後，您可以使用看起來命令特定部門的命令菜單。^^
請注意，選項將保持不變，按任何命令菜單(F1，F2，F3)將選擇最後一個分區。
閱讀屏幕上顯示的消息，查看正在命令的分區。^^
現在，讓你的步兵跟隨你，然後讓你的弓箭手也跟著你。一旦他們在一起，回到你在的山上。^^
到達那里後，尋找指針，命令步兵移動並按住'1'，然後按住'F1'鍵顯示旗幟。您可以使用它來將您的部隊移動到您選擇的精確位置。^^
讓你的弓箭手朝著指針後方的旗幟移動，並在高地上移動。

你的人處於適當的位置，敵人聚集在一起並向你衝鋒陷陣。 
使用你學到的東西來訓練你的步兵前進，或者讓他們衝鋒陷陣。
衝鋒會打破所有陣型，並將你的部隊移向最近的敵人。^^
你也可以讓你的弓箭手保持在地面以獲得更好的有利位置，或者讓他們移動到其他地方。^^
你也可以按'F3'顯示第三個命令 菜單，了解你可以給你的部隊的不同武器命令。

精彩！ 你已經在Mount＆Blade完成了第一次野戰。
在戰鬥中智能指揮你的部隊對你作為戰鬥指揮官的成功至關重要。確保了解如何在有利的位置上移動你的部隊。^^

無畏的安格博和他的剛鐸夥伴阻止了哈拉德的軍隊。\n他大聲呼喊，奔馳前進，帶領忠心的人展開激烈的戰鬥。

^唉，這 幾 天 的 悲 傷 記 憶！在 伊 姆 拉 崔 半 精 靈 愛 隆 的 故 居，人 們 可 能 會 回 想 起 昔 日 伊 瑞 詹 的 榮 耀 和 輝 煌。但 是 世 界 不 會 再 像 以 前 那 樣 了。^^伊 瑞 詹 的 田 野 雖 然 被 人 喜 愛，但 已 經 不 再由 人 類 去 耕 種。登 丹 人，他 們 的 數 量 在 亞 爾 諾 分 裂 後 大 幅 減 少，仍 然 在 北方 荒 野 中 孤 獨 地 守 夜。吉 爾 加 拉 德 的 統 治 已 經 過 去，因 為 長 子 的 減 少，並 進 入 西 方，同 時 古 老 努 曼 諾 爾 的 族 人 減 少，西 方 大 地 的 種 族 衰 落 了。^^儘 管 瑞 文 戴 爾 仍 然 是 庇 護 所，但 黑 暗 的 日 子 圍 繞 整 個 大 地。^^最 後 一 個 召 號 響 起，來 自 伊 姆 拉 崔 的 強 大 隊 伍，也 許 是 世 界 上 所 有 紀 元 的 最 後 一 個 隊 伍，出 征 了。你 是 這 隊 伍 的 其 中 一 員，儘 管 你 將 按 照 明 智 而 偉 大 的 指 示 去 履 行 職 責，但 你 的 內 心 並 非 沒 有 疑 慮。無 論 在 伊 姆 拉 崔，或 是 在 灰 港 岸，或 是 在 黃 金 森 林 羅 瑞 安，都 沒 有 足 夠 力 量 抵 禦 敵 人，如 果 一 切 都 被 推 翻 的 話，敵 人 就 會 變 得 強 大 起 來。^^然 而 渺 茫 的 希 望 仍 存 在：如 果 可 以 恢 復 昔 日的 友 誼，並 且 聯 同 所 有 對 抗 邪 惡 的 人 面 對 共 同 的 敵 人，也 許 有 時 會 勝 利，也 許 最 後 能 結 束 魔 多 的 威 脅。^^如 果 昔 日 的 盟 友 失 敗 了 ，而 老 朋 友 們 被 催 毀 了，在 真 正 的 夜 幕 來 臨 之 前，除 了 蔓 延 的 黑 暗 日 子 以 外 便 別 無 他 物。所 有 人 都 會 墮 入 陰 影 之 中。

^陰 影 籠 罩 著 森 林 國 度，這 是 從 多 爾 哥 多 彌 漫 出 來 的 一 種 毒 物。魔 多 君 主 回 到 了 他 的 邪 黑 塔，他 在 多 爾 哥 多的 副 官 們 把 巨 綠 森 大 部 分 地 區 變 成 了 令 人 恐 懼 的 地 方，即 使 是 你 的 人 民，即 北 方 的 木 精 靈，也 不 能 自 由 地 前 進。^^歐 瑞 費 爾 的 兒 子 瑟 蘭 督 伊 領 導 你 們 的 人 民，但 他 的 政 策 一 直 持 謹 慎 態 度，也 許 是 因 為 達 哥 拉 的 悲 痛 令 人 記 憶 猶 新。現 在，河 谷 鎮 的 人 正 受 到 即 將 來 臨 的 戰 爭 威 脅，你 的 國 王 激 勵 了 自 己。他 從 不 望 向 南 方 只 因 內 心 深 處 有 一 個 陰 影，他 會 拖 延 很 久，直 到 他 帶 領 人 民 進 入 廢 墟，但 是 決 定 的 日 子 已 經 到 了。^^帶 著 長 矛，劍 刃 和 弓 箭，你 會 捍 衛 國 王 統 治 下 的 王 國 邊 界，如 有 需 要，你 下 定 決 心 援 助 任 何 與 幽 暗 密 林 精 靈 並 肩 對 抗 共 同 敵 人 的 人。^^恐 懼 在 你 心 中 細 語，正 如 它 在 你 的 同 伴 心 中 一 樣，如 果 不 恢 復 昔 日 的 友 誼，而 老 朋 友 們 被 催 毀 了，那 麼 幽 暗 密 林 將 被 黑 暗 籠 罩。所 有 人 都 會 墮 入 陰 影 之 中。

^對 於 三 代 人 來 說，河 谷 鎮 王 國 繁 榮 了。國 王 布 蘭 德，神 射 手 巴 德 的 孫 子，公 平 地 統 治 著 並 利 用 貿 易 使 王 國 更 加 富 裕。^^但 是，敵 人 現 在 開 始 入 侵，聚 集 在 東 部 邊 界 的 脆 弱，愛 爭 吵 的 游 牧 民 族，他 們 的 語 言 複 雜，便 人 們 更 加 難 以 信 任。現 在 必 須 把 玩 具，鈴 鐺 和 漂 亮 的 洋 娃 娃 放 置 一 旁，以 擺 放 矛，弓 和 堅 固 的 盾 牌。砍 樹 不 是 為 了 新 的 棚 架，而 是 為 了 箭 袋 和 箭 矢。年 輕 人 不 去 耕 地 或 收 割 果 園，而 是 去 兵 營，作 戰 和 赤 色 黎 明。^^但 河 谷 鎮 擁 有 堅 定 的 盟 友：孤 山 的 矮 人，磚 石 裝 飾 了 河 谷 鎮 的 每 條 街 道。而 且，幽 暗 密 林 精 靈 也 與 你 的 人 民 有 往 來，對 所 有 人 都 有 好 處。粗 壯 結 實 的 波 寧 人 在 渡 口 保 持 貿 易 路 線 的 安 全 和 開 放。在 這 些 黑 暗 的 日 子 裡，所 有 拒 絕 魔 多 霸 主 的 人 都 必 須 站 在 一 起，否 則 會 像 田 間 的 麥 稈 一 樣 被 單 獨 砍 伐。^^你 決 心 儘 自 己 的 一 份 力 量，因 為 如 果 堅 強 的 河 谷 鎮 捍 衛 者 失 敗 了，那 麼 巴 德 的 防 線 將 會 完 結，北 方 的 最 後 一 個 人 類 王 國 將 不 再 存 在。所 有 人 都 會 墮 入 陰 影 之 中。

^我 們 從 沙 漠 的深 處，茂 密 的 叢 林 和 陽 光 普 照 的 河 岸 而來。讓 剛 鐸 的 人 民 敬 畏 並 順 從 我 們 吧。他 們 說 自 古 以 來 都 擁 有 波 羅 斯 河 以 南 土 地 的 權 利，因 此 他 們 命 名 這 條 河 為 哈 隆 鐸，即「 南 剛 鐸 」，並 稱 我 們 為 入 侵 者。我 們 不 懂 他 們 的 說 法。難 道 在 瘟 疫 時 代，巨 蛇 的 意 志 不 就 是 以 死 亡 和 疾 病 驅 趕 了 剛 鐸 人，並 允 許 我 們 的 祖 先 定 居 於 此 嗎？為 甚 麼 有 人 缺 乏 大 能 的 祝 褔，僅 僅 憑 他 們 一 點 力 量 去 宣 稱 擁 有 這 片 土 地？我 們 的 祖 先 死 亡 或 離 去 時 不 曾 在 此 地 定 居 嗎？^^還 有，他 們 說 在 很 久 以 前，他 們 教 曉 我 們 手 工 藝 和 在 土 地 上 種 植 食 物 的 技 能，因 此 我 們 應 該 成 為 他 們 的 附 庸。我 們 也 不 能 理 解 以 前 他 們 的 國 王 塔 爾 ‧ 克 亞 單 和他 的 隨 從 拿 了 我 們 很 多 貢 品，並 且 掠 奪 了 我 們 最 寶 貴 的 財 富。然 後 他 們 自 大 地 說：感 恩 吧，向 剛 鐸 的 管 理 者 奉 上 貢 品。現 在 因 為 愚 昧 而 長 年 沒 有 國 王 的 他 們 竟 敢 向 我 們 提 出 要 求？^^我 們 不 像 那 群 骯 髒 的 半 獸 人，或 是 那 個 黑 暗 巫 師 要 求 巨 大 的 犧 牲。我 們 有 很 多 年 輕 男 女 已 經 被 奉 獻 到 黑 暗 之 地，但 他 仍 然 想 要 更 多。然 而，有 了 他 的 力 量 和 幫 助，從 太 陽 升 起 到 落 日 的 所 有 土 地 都 將 歸 我 們 所 有，而 我 們 應 該 擁 有 它 們。^^剛 鐸 時 代 即 將 結 束。就 讓 戰 鬥 加 入 吧！

^你 們 的 馬 車 城 市 已 經 在 高 地 草 原 徘 徊 了 很 多 個 晚 上。你 們 的 酋 長 從 那 個 在 魔 多 歸 來 的 力 量 獲 得 了 忠 告。他 們 向 你 和 你 的 戰 士 承 諾 了 很 多 事 情：他 們 將 為 戰 車 民 的 失 敗 和 畢 額 丘 斯 人 的 屈 辱 報 仇；徹 底 抹 去 那 些 敢 於 自 稱 為「 東 方 征 服 者 」的 古 代 國 王 所 訂 下 的 剛 鐸 人 律 法；他 們 會 為 氏 族 贏 得很 多 奴 隸 和 財 富。^^他 們 說 了 很 多 話，但 你 知 道 你 並 不 是 為 了 安 逸 的 生 活 而 戰，例 如 那 些 又 肥 又 軟 弱 的 長 湖 鎮 人，或 是 在 岩 石 隧 道 中 亂 竄 的 矮 小 而 貪 婪 的 挖 土 者，或 是 那 群 躲 藏 在 樹 上 歌 唱 的 膽 小 精 靈。^最 重 要 的 是 榮 耀，在 戰 鬥 中 獲 勝，並 不 是 要 酋 長 承 諾 會 在 你 死 後 為 你 取 得 在 山 峰 上 留 下 記 號 的 榮 譽，而 是 憑 著 技 巧 和 力 量 為 你 贏 得 站 在 那 裡 的 權 利。如 果 你 必 須 與 骯 髒 而 無 恥 的 半 獸 人 一 起 戰 鬥 一 段 時 間，那 就 這 樣 吧，但 你 的 事 蹟 將 屬 於 你 自 己，並 且 在 篝 火 旁 一 遍 又 一 遍 被 傳 頌 許 多 世 代。^^西 方 的 時 代 將 要 結 束。 東 方 的 時 代 來 了！

^在 剛 鐸 以 豐 富 而 肥 沃 的 土 地 為 榮 的 貴 族 們 正 坐 在 被 盜 去 的 土 地上，那 土 地 是 屬 於 卡 斯 塔 馬，正 統 的 國 王，但 王 位 被 不 忠 的 孬 種 篡 奪 了。卡 斯 塔 馬 的 後 代 良 治 國 家，並 在 海 上 和 沿 海 地 區 取 得 了 不 少 勝 利。^^但 是，又 再 一 次，象 徵 失 敗 的 悲 痛 之 風 在 你 面 前 吹 來。幾 年 前，不 忠 的 剛 鐸 人 在 主 要 避 風 港 上發 動 了 卑 鄙 的 夜 襲，優 秀 的 昂 巴 士 兵 被 派 遣 到 海 旁。你 失 去 了 船，船 長 也 沒 了，而 你 是 昔 日 船 員 的 倖 存 者 之 一。^^但 是 仍 有 五 十 艘 大 船，還 有 無 數 小 船 剩 下。黑 暗 之 地 的 君 主 傳 來 了 號 召。現 在 是 進 行 盤 算 的 時 候 了。你 將 加 入 南 方 大 地 的 武 裝 兄 弟：帶 有 嚴 肅 眼 神 的 哈 拉 德 人，而 你 的 復 仇 將 對 準 奸 詐 的 剛 鐸 人，直 至 貝 爾 法 拉 斯 和 安 法 拉 斯 都 陷 入 火 海，你 將 擁 有 載 滿 財 富 的 寶 箱。^^剛 鐸 時 代 要 結 束 了。昂 巴 的 時 代 來 了！

^These woods, these old paths, and the Ford are the only home you have ever known, but old Beorn was one who remembered an older home, far away in the mountains. His son, Chief Grimbeorn the Old, now stands foremost among your people, and like his father, he is apt to sit on the great Carrock at night, setting his sight to the west, deep in his own thoughts.^^For your part, your thoughts are simple. The woods grow dangerous. Foul orcs grow bolder, and walk about even in daylight. The wolves they ride will not listen even to one of your people, so twisted have they become by goblin ways. The air feels and smells different, bad. The further south you go, closer to Dol Guldur, where not so long ago the Sorcerer dwelled and did things unworthy of naming, the worse it gets.^^The Elves huddle in their caves to the north. Most will not come out to protect the woodland, its animals and trees and other things that move and live.^^Your people will fight, as you always have, to keep the Ford and the forest safe. With a stout stick in your hands, you will smash any orcs that dare intrude. And if it should come to greater blows, why, many among your people are more than they seem…^^But if even the grim battle-strength of the Beornings should fail, then the world will know no more the joy of sweet honey, bright flowers, shady forest paths and all things good. All will fall beneath the Shadow.

^The South Kingdom of Gondor, “land of stone” in Sindarin, is inhabited by descendants of the ancient Númenoreans. Under the rule of Steward Denethor, these proud men stand as the first and perhaps last line of defence against the Enemy.^^Gondor’s military consists of forces coming from all the different fiefdoms. You get the standard army with solid and well-armoured troops overall: Dol Amroth’s heavy cavalry, green-clad archers and spearmen from Pinnath Gelin, bowmen from the Blackroot Vale, axemen of Lossarnach, heavy marines from Pelargir or hardened clansmen of Lamedon.

^Dwarves, also known as Durin’s Folk, are short, tough and doughty warriors. They are renowned for the craftsmanship of their weaponry and armour, though they say with regret that they cannot match the lost arts of their ancestors. In these latter days, they come from the Lonely Mountain and the Iron Hills.^^Their army consists of an infantry line, a scout/archer line and an Iron Hills line (their heaviest hard-hitting infantry).

^Rohirrim are the horse lords of the Mark of Rohan, led by king Théoden.^^Rohirrim have very good cavalry, ranging from heavy lancers to agile horse archers. They have an infantry line as well, branching into shieldwall-forming troops and heavy swordsmen bearing longswords.

^ 魔 多 代 表 索 倫 自 己 在 黑 土 的 黑 暗 中 積 蓄 的 力 量。^ 魔 多 軍 隊 由 半 獸 人 和 邪 惡 的 人（黑 努 曼 諾 爾 人）組 成。 魔 多 半 獸 人 是 裝 備 更 好，更 強 壯 的 半 獸 人，但 沒 有 弓 兵。 大 多 數 常 規 半 獸 人 都 是 步 兵，散 兵 或 弓 兵，但 也 有 半 獸 人 座 狼 騎 兵。 黑 努 曼 諾 爾 人 相 對 罕 見，但 步 兵 或 騎 兵 非 常 危 險。 索 倫 還 培 育 了 戰 鬥 食 人 妖，但 他 們 很 難 獲 得。

^Isengard is ruled by Saruman, the traitor wizard. He created his own version of orcs: the Uruk-hai.^^The forces of Isengard are quite well-equipped, though the weapons and armour may seem crude. The orcs are comparable to any other orcs, but the Uruk-hai are truly deadly killing machines wielding pikes, halberds, heavy axes and nasty cleavers. They also have the largest and most powerful bows among any of the orcish races.

^The Elves of Lothlórien, known as the tree-dwelling “Galadhrim”, are a powerful group of Nandor and Sindar living in the Lórien woods, led by Lord Celeborn and Lady Galadriel.^^Their forces consist of an infantry line and a scout line, with the occasional incorporation of an elite unit of Noldorin horse archers. All their troops are highly skilled, equipped with the finest arms and armour of Elven make, and overall extremely deadly in combat. A rain of arrows from under the forest cover, followed by a devastating infantry charge, is their main tactic.

^The Elves of Imladris (Rivendell) are Sindar and Noldor led by Lord Elrond and his two sons. They are custodians of the ancient lore of the west, as well as powerful and ancient artifacts dating back to the First Age. Under their banner, the Dúnedain of the North march as well – the remnants of the broken Northern kingdoms of Men are tall dark-haired rangers and nobles, clad in sturdy leathers or ancient maille.^^The soldiers of Imladris are among the most highly-skilled in Middle-Earth, and are extremely well-equipped. Their armies are capable of considerable tactical flexibility.

^The Silvan Elves, called “wood-elves” in ancient times, live today in Mirkwood, led by King Thranduil.^^The Elves of Mirkwood have a competent infantry line that features both spears and swords. Their scouts and archers are the mainstay of their armies, more so than for their cousins of Lórien. Their armour is light but affords a great deal of protection.

^Dale is a city rebuilt by Northmen who share ancestry with the Rohirrim, joined by the survivors from the lake city of Esgaroth (after it was burnt down by Smaug).^^Men of Dale provide tough infantry focused on polearms, famous archer troops including the legendary Barding bowmen, and a merchant guard line acting as reasonably good cavalry.

^The Haradrim, the “hosts of the South” in Sindarin, come from the deserts and rainforests of the far South. They have a fondness for wearing bright colours and heavy gold ornamentation in warfare.^^Haradrim have average but competent infantry (skirmishers/archers and spearmen/swordsmen) from Great Harad, a cavalry line (incorporating both heavy cavalry and horse archers) from Harondor and a Far Harad line of tribal warriors.

^Men of Rhûn are tribal Easterlings hailing from around the sea of Rhûn, far to the east.^^The bulk of their army is cavalry - horse archers and lancers, both very lightly-equipped. Their top-tier cavalrymen ride much larger and heavier mounts, with more barding. Their infantrymen are also quite lightly-armoured and wield large axes and swords. In the open field, a cavalry host of Rhûn can be a fearsome force to face.

^The Variags of Khand are fierce Easterling raiders who wear terrifying battlemasks into battle.^^They rely on fast light infantry (skirmishers and blademasters) and heavy axemen, while their cavalry line contains both light agile skirmishers and heavy kataphracts. The light infantry fling devastating volleys of throwing spears while screening the advance of the main host. The most savage among them charge into battle wearing little armour, attacking with great strength and ferocity.

^The Corsairs of Umbar are southern enemies of Gondor, descendants of the Black Númenoreans who conduct numerous raids on Gondor’s coastlines.^^Corsairs employ both lightly-armoured skirmishers and heavier swordmasters as well as skilled longbowmen. Being a mainly seafaring force, they favour armour that sacrifices toughness for mobility.

^Orcs of Moria occupy the halls of Khazad Dúm, once a mighty Dwarven kingdom.^^Like regular orcs, their forces consist of a mix of infantry, archers, skirmishers and warg-riders, but generally they have better equipment than other orcs, because they use metal scraps found in Moria. Some lucky few among them also have access to bits of looted dwarven armour and weapons. Orc Chieftains of Moria have proved themselves stronger and fiercer than their kin, and they are fearsome in battle.

^Dol Guldur is an old fortress of Sauron in Mirkwood – indeed, it is the reason “Greenwood the Great” is now known by this darker name.^^Here, a contingent loyal to Mordor trains and prepares a great host, sending out frequent raiding parties against the Elves as well as the parties of Men who pass through the woods. The troops of Dol Guldur are mostly orcs, with a lineup very similar to Mordor’s (infantry, skirmishers, archers, warg riders), but with somewhat less variety.

^Gundabad was a place sacred to the Dwarves, but in these days it has become a massive Orc stronghold in the northern mountains.^^The Gundabad orcs, though more savage than their fellows from other places, fight much like any other orcs, with a similar army lineup (infantry, archers, skirmishers, warg riders). Their equipment is primitive and their fighting style barbaric. Their warg riders are unrivalled in toughness and ferocity. Some among the orcs of Gundabad can even whip themselves into a battle-frenzy.

^The Dunlendings are the “wild men of Dunland”, enemies of the Rohirrim who drove them from their homeland.^^Dunland is barren and poor. The Dunlendings wear very little real armour – mostly furs and cured leather, with some metal signifying status. For weaponry, they wield long pikes and antler axes, with rare swords serving as emblems of prestige. Their horses are thin and weak, certainly no match for the steeds of Rohan, though occasionally the Dunlendings will ride them into battle as skirmishers. In battle, the pikemen advance en masse, presenting a crude but formidable wall of sharp polearms. Some Dunlendings have also cultivated affinity with creatures of the wild, and may unleash packs of savage wolves against their foes.

^Beornings, the descendants of Beorn, are a people of the upper Vales of Anduin, between Mirkwood and the Misty Mountains. They dwell mostly in the forests, though they keep the Old Ford clear for trade, exacting a toll on merchant caravans for their service.^^As woodsmen, they wield stout sticks and sharp axes, but wear little in the way of armour. Heavier Beorning infantry fight with shields as well. Beorning foresters are skilled bowmen and provide a valuable archer line.

But no one withstands the will of Zigûrphel for long, Commander. No one. I took his Ring from him, in the dungeons of Dol Guldur, and sent it on to the Dark Tower for a great reward. High I rose then, in the Dark Lord's favour!
驍駿勇騎今何在？吹角長鳴何處聞？高盔鐵衣今何在？明亮金發何處飄振？詩琴妙手今何在？俱往矣，如山崗微雨，草原飄風；落日西墜，幽隱山後。 (摘自鄧嘉宛譯，魔戒魔戒同盟卷三第六章)
曾經由南方王國建造，現在則是人稱白袍巫師的家；正計劃著，毫無疑問，通過犧牲他人來進一步增強他的力量。
我從未嘗試過這麼遠，但我無意中聽到我們的幽暗密林偵察員說這裡可能有戒靈。 我感到邪惡的存在，我不知道它叫甚麼名子。 但它很強大，所以讓我們做好準備吧。
從這裡的荒涼和許多半獸人足跡來看，我很擔心勇敢的巴林和他探險的最終命運。看來摩瑞亞已經落入了陰影中，我們應該小心些。 (注：巴林是霍比特人中跟隨索林·橡木盾前往孤山的十三位矮人之一，後來進入摩瑞亞希望回复它昔日的榮光)
一個旅行商人偶爾會來到河谷鎮集市，並售賣一種我這輩子嚐過的最棒的蜂蜜。由於一些古怪的原因，他總說這種蜂蜜是熊做的，然後哈哈大笑。
這該死的城牆又高又硬，我的錘子根本打不破。我猜如果我們追擊伊多拉斯的豬玀，他們肯定會跑到這裡，然後蹲在牆後面瑟瑟發抖。
你知道那座城鎮麼？

It pleases me to be marching with you, Great One. The leaders of my people will want to have this land again, which was once theirs. They may take as much as they like from Gondor and the West. For my part, if I can spill the blood of more enemies on this soil, I will count myself happy.

You will speak for me, won't you, Commander, when the long war is over? To whichever Power holds sway over the other - Eye or Hand? You will lend your voice to my claim, that I may hold Edoras and all Rohan in fief to an overlord, as my home and holding?

We shall crush the works of the Valar, of which these Dwarfs are a chief part, here in Middle-earth. Yes, it would be sweet to unmake what the Maker wrought. We will grind the Dwarves beneath our heels, shatter the last kingdoms of low Men, and laugh as the Elves fade into the mists like ghosts. Then the day will come when I stand before the Caves of the Forgotten, in Valinor, and call forth my king again!
我們會牢記過去的偉大事蹟和犧牲。洛汗和剛鐸的聯軍將再一次拯救我們的人民免遭厄運。
我只希望我們銘記，即使是偉大者的一員，甚至是一位埃斯塔力，都有可能被腐蝕和墮落。追求力量者必被力量所毀，只希望我們不要拖得太久。 (注：埃斯塔力在昆雅語中意譯為博學者，特指巫師)
我能感覺到牆後的邪惡大軍正準備出發…去美麗的羅斯洛立安？去河谷鎮？去我的家鄉幽暗密林？我不知道，但請盡你的一切努力阻止他們。
如果命運帶給我們一大支軍隊的話，我想我們應該冒險進入礦井，取回他們的巨大財富。
我聞到了甜蜜的花香，也看到了蜜蜂收穫的蜜糖。如果您不介意的，我能去弄點蜂蜜自用麼？我只需要幾分鐘就能搞定。
如果我們沒有大量強獸人在背後支持的話，留在這裡一點兒用處都沒有。當然，如果你想對牆上的哨兵做鬼臉那就是另一回事兒了，哈哈！
米那斯魔窟，戒靈那裡整天喝酒，哈哈！

I was a prisoner in stocks, condemned to die for slaying a son of Lurmsakun in the training pit. Three of them set upon me, and I beat them, but one died of his wounds. Then you spoke for me, and freed me. Now I kill for you, and I would die for you if need be.

I am of the royal blood of Rohan, I swear - King Fengel was my grandfather, though he never took my grandmother to wife. The Chiefs of Dunland are jealous of me, and kept me away from the fighting so I would do no great deeds, and win no glory nor men to my banner. Then you took my under your banner. Now I await the day I can sit in Edoras on my rightful throne.

What more is there to tell, Commander? I practised my arts in the dungeons of Dol Guldur. My dreaming eye sees deep and far, and I saw you and your works in this War. It would seem I must give you what aid I can, so that the powers of the West may fail and the Power in the East may rise once more and rule until the world's ending.
你如此輕易忘記並不令我感到有趣。
我會滿足你的好奇心的，但別在這兒逗留了。
我生長在幽暗密林中，是一位西爾凡精靈。我們族人的木工技術無可匹敵。
我是德瓦林之子，都靈的子民。
我是一名來自河谷鎮的治療師兼草藥醫生。
葛瑪會說如果你一定要聽，但講故事可殺不死敵人。
我會盡快搞定的。

在剛鐸王的許可下，我尋找勇敢的同盟。這地方有這樣的嗎？

Nay, Commander. What valour we have is needed to defend our own walls. You may go to the barracks and find soldiers of courage and experience - mayhap more the former than the latter, I fear. Ever have we been traders, crafters and farmers. The finest of our soldiers go to the capital to enlist - perhaps you should try the White City.
很好。 我感謝你的忠告。
我謝謝你。 願所有善良的人的善意與你同在。

Why, Commander, there is one, and gladly shall I tell you of him; he is a gate guard, by the name of Cirdil, and even now I warrant you’ll find him at his rounds. He is dutiful and brave - but I spoke with him of late, and it seems to me he wishes to do more than simply stand his watch on the walls while the Shadow gathers beyond them. Surely he will be happy to venture out from the White City in your company.

Indeed there are. High in the esteem of our Captain Faramir are two of our commanders, Mablung and Damrod. Damrod is away at our Captain’s behest; but Mablung may be found in the cave yonder, a little way along this path here. We Rangers know much of woodlore and archery; Mablung stands above many of us. He is a man of prowess, and accounted one of our finest. Mayhap he will be given leave to accompany you for a time.
離開了希優頓王，我尋求勇敢的洛汗的幫助。 這裡有任何勇敢的戰士會跟著我嗎？

It were better if you sought to bring aid, rather than asked for it. Horses, swords, spears - these things we need at present. As for your question: go to the barracks. There you will find those of our people willing to ride forth, such as they are - many beardless youths still, and still others unskilled herders and tenders of flocks.
我也為你的人民著想，統領。再會。
我覺得這個建議不錯。健康與你同在！

Indeed, there may be. Dark indeed must the days become before our women ride out to war alongside the menfolk - yet our fearless and high-hearted Lady Eowyn, whom all love, rides and fights as well as any Marshal. Some shieldmaidens have trained with her from childhood, and several may be found around the Golden Hall. Hardy indeed are our women! Seek one called Galmyne - she is skilled in many arts of war, and goes about like a mare chafing at an ill-fitting bridle, for she has not been given leave to ride out with the men.
Elder, I seek aid. The least among the Elves of Lorien fight like heroes of old; will any here join my cause?

Evil has been seen and heard even here, among the mallorn-trees; sorrow has been known. In happier days we plucked the strings of harps; in these days we have indeed become skilled at the plucking of bowstrings. I cannot speak of heroes among us, but you should speak to the commander of our garrison here. Perhaps some few of our people may consent to join you for a time.
I had hoped for fairer words in this fair land of yours. But it shall be as you say, Elder.
我 感 謝 你 的 忠 告，老 人。Tiro ven Elbereth! ( 精 靈 語：願 瓦 爾 妲 守 護 你 )

Nan Belain, here is a wonder indeed! At any other time I might have had naught but disappointment for you, but now in the company of the Lord and Lady of the Wood stands none other than the Lord Glorfindel, hero of more battles than even I can remember. I know little of such a great champion’s purpose here - he arrived with the host of Elrond, Lord of Imladris, and his own counsel he keeps, speaking only with Lord Celeborn and Lady Galadriel. Seek him out, Commander. Perhaps his cause may be joined to yours.
Your advice, good fellow - are there any warriors of remarkable prowess here?

Well, I don’t know about that. Your question isn’t very clear. What kind of “remarkable prowess” do you want that you can’t find among our garrison, I ask you? We fight with stout staves and sharp hatchets, we shoot well enough with bows. I don’t know what more you could ask for.
Well, then, I suppose I’d best be off. Good day to you, woodsman.
I see. Well, I shall look around for this “Dimborn”. Good day to you, woodsman.

Well, now, there’s a question. I’d say any of us could fight off a goblin or warg well enough, but our chief’s nephew is stouter than most. Spends most of his time just staring at trees, though. Or at nothing in particular. More thew than thought, if you take my meaning. Still, he’s gentle with his friends but fierce to his enemies, as one should be. Walks the woods as well as any Elf, I’d say. We call him Dimborn; not to be unkind, you understand, but we like calling things and people what they are. He ought to be around here somewhere.
By leave of Thranduil Elvenking, I seek champions of the Greenwood to fight in my command, Elder.

Indeed? Then you may ask those of our garrison, and mayhap some will be willing to follow you. But I sense your desire runs deeper than that. Do you fancy yourself a great hero, like those from Nargothrond or Gondolin of old? Our finest warriors are needed to guard against the growing shadow in Mirkwood. Take with you what soldiers we can spare, and be content.
很好，老人。 正如你所說。
我感謝你的忠告，老人。Navaer(精靈語:再見)！

Indeed? There is one among us whose aid you should not despise. Luevanna is her name, and she is kin to me, as it happens. She is young, as our people reckon it, and has an abiding love for the woods and all the creatures in it, save those which are evil. Hers is a gentle spirit - she has not fought in our array. Still, I have a hope that she may be persuaded to follow you, for then she may come to learn that though we love peaceful ways in peaceful days, times of war call for warlike deeds. See, there she stands - you may speak with her. Harthon gerithach lend vaer!
好主人，我在這場戰爭中尋找堅強的勇士和我一起戰鬥。

Well, now. Here in our town, we have always plied our trades and managed our affairs quietly, and not until recently have we had a great need for fighting men. I suppose you might ask at our barracks, and find what recruits you can from our garrison. I know of none among our captains here who would abandon his post to follow you.
我會那樣做，好主人。 再見。
通常，不拘小節的禮物證明了最好的價值。我要和法妮爾談談。再會！

Well, the King and his Lords have the best claim on the service of good captains. I don’t know that any of great renown are left to follow you - but are mere fighting men all you need? What about binders of wounds, versed in herblore? I know of one such - Faniul, personal healer to the King. She was midwife to my sister - and do not look askance at her age: she is of stout heart and sturdier than she looks. I warrant she’ll bear up well under the strains of travel. Why, I think I see her taking her ease over there, in this courtyard.
好主人，這裡似乎有一些英勇的戰士。有人要加入我們的隊伍嗎？

Well, you’re not wrong, there, about our skill in battle, but aren’t our lads from our garrison here good enough for you? Apart from them, I don’t know anyone else who might satisfy you - you talk as though you were a king of some sort, looking for a great champion, like in the old days. Valiant is as valiant does, say I!
你不必那麼生氣，好主人，我只是問問而已。祝你今天快樂。
聽上去真好，大師。祝你今天快樂！

Oh ho! It’s warriors you’re after, are you? Then I have just the Dwarf for you: look for one Kili Goldfinger. A most excellent and audacious Dwarf he is, and a credit to his clan. Fights almost as well as a Longbeard, though he’s still fairly young as we reckon it. Quite good at story-telling, too, and he favours the cheerful sort of tale. Go and have a talk with him - I shouldn’t think he needs much persuading to follow you out into the wide world and do his bit for the war. Now, let me see… he’s not down here at the moment. Not the Great Chamber, either. The upper halls, perhaps - look for him there.
我聽說這裡有偉大的戰士。他們在哪裡？誰值得加入我？
Not all our warriors here are blooded, but each of them is stronger and braver than any ten Dalishmen! Go and ask the arms master to see if he can spare any for you.
我要偉大的戰士，你給我看喝母乳的人。呸！
很高興聽到最後 - 一個有靈魂的戰士！

Our greatest swordbearers and riders fight in the retinues of our warlords. But there is one who has found favour with none of our chiefs so far. Not because he is weak; far from it! He does not curb his tongue when he speaks, and he has spoken loudly against our chieftains, saying they are slow to act and over-cautious. If he had his way, I wager the countryside would be covered in flames by now. His name is Varfang, and he spends his hours training near the prisoner cages, not far from this tent.
All I see here is a rabble of treacherous skulkers, more likely to run than fight. Where are your proper warriors?

O ho! What do we have here? A great captain, are you? I reckon your bark’s worse than your bite, and no mistake. Orders are orders: you draw your troops from our garrison here, and that’s that. Keep talking like that where they’ve got ears to hear, though, and someone will stick a knife in your back one of these days, see if they don’t.
如果你知道什麼對你有好處，你會和我一起看你的話。
Scared witless by this woman, are you? I’ll go see if she’s all you make her out to be. This had better not be a waste of my time!

We’ve got stout lads aplenty, curse you. Ha… I know what you’re really after. Oh yes, indeed, I know just where you should go, Commander. See that cave over there, with steps leading down? If our boys get hurt badly enough we send them down there, and I reckon almost a third of them make it back up, har! They can do very strange things, down there… and that one in particular, the woman… she gives me the shivers, and that’s saying something. They say she’s got something to do with Number One, or even Higher Up, if you take my meaning. Talk to her, if you dare.
All I see here is a rabble of treacherous skulkers, more likely to run than fight. Where are your proper warriors?

Proper warriors, {she/he} says! I reckon any of our snaga could give any of your lubbers a good drubbing. We’re a tough lot, we are, and no mistake. Go speak to our barracks master - but speak with respect, mind, or you’ll not get our stout fellows to follow you. Knife you as soon as your back is turned, if you don’t speak proper.
I’ll speak how I like to the lot of you. I save my respect for those much Higher Up than your sort!
Garn! A sawbones, you say? Among this lot? All right, I’ll have a talk with him, but you’d better hope you aren’t telling me a crock of rubbish.

Ha! Losing more than you can keep, are you? Throwing our stout lads into the meat grinder, and then cursing when you find you haven’t got enough left to win your battles? A right splendid commander you are, oh yes. Very well - look over there! I’ll give you a helpful hint now, and you’ll remember it, yes? You see that fellow on the crates, the one with blood all over his hands, muttering to himself? Not much of a killer, but where’s the blood from, I hear you ask? Why, it’s the blood from some of our fighters he’s helped put back on their feet. He’s a sawbones, that one. You’ll see for yourself, the next time you lead your troops into another mess and find you need some stitching done.
I’ve heard about the fighting Uruk-hai. So far, I’m not impressed. Where are the greatest among them?

Leading patrols and armies of their own, no doubt - why would they lower themselves to fight under your command? They’ve got their own Orders to follow, from Higher Up. If you want fighting lads, go talk to the garrison chief! We’ve got stout fellows aplenty.
This rabble isn’t what you make it out to be. Stout fellows? Fighting lads? Snagas aplenty, more like. Slavering swine.
If he kills well, I’ll take him. If not, I’ll gut him like a fish. And if he does turn out to be just another worthless maggot, I’ll come back and pay you for wasting my time!

A great commander you are, it is plain to see, and wisely do you choose to take only the bravest and most skilled fighters under your banner. And yet, if you will take my counsel - a battle is won not merely with iron and sinew, Commander, but with guile and foreknowledge of the foeman’s doings, his comings and goings. We have a scoutmaster here, an Orc who has sworn allegiance to Saruman the Great. I have heard that he spent many years in the Misty Mountains, catching and taming wargs. A skilled tracker and hunter is Durgash. You will find him a most useful helper, Commander. He's usually lurking around the warg pits.

O ho! So you think our finest lads should humble themselves and take orders from you, do you? You’re a bold one, and no mistake. I know just the fellow for you. Calls himself Gulm, and he’s a proper fierce one, he is. Never seen anyone take so much pleasure in bashing in skulls and breaking bones with that mallet of his. And the more foes he kills, the more savage he seems to get. I don’t rightly know where he is at the moment, though - but he’s in this camp for sure, trying not to attract attention for some reason. Does that sound suitable for you, O Great Commander, taking an Uruk-hai berserker into your camp?
So, these are the Men of the hills who serve the White Hand! A sorry-looking lot. Where are your fighters of note?
Following those greater than you, no doubt. If you want warriors, speak to the training masters. See for yourself if any of our young pups will follow you into battle.
Curs and whelps! It is no wonder your people were driven into the hills by the men of Rohan.
A treacherous wolf, I would hardly keep by my side. But a tame hunting dog, I might consider. Let me see which one this Heidrek proves to be.

Despise us at your peril! Even a wretched cur will snap at your heels in a fight. We will have our vengeance on the Forgoil and their allies - and likely it will be Heidrek whom we’ll follow into Edoras. He’s a mongrel, that one - says he’s the grandson of a strawhead king, for all that he looks no different from any of us. He’s a terror in the training yard. If Chief Daeglaf doesn’t watch his back he just might find Heidrek’s spear in it one of these days. Maybe he’ll deign to follow you, if he thinks you’re worth his time. Look for him at the main campfire, where our chieftains stand.
我聽說這裡有偉大的戰士。他們在哪裡？誰值得加入我？

Those who have earned their death masks wish to follow commanders of still greater renown, but you may look for new recruits among our pitfighters and levies. Do not presume more than your station, Commander!
I ask for warriors and you show me pit slaves and unblooded peasants. Waste my time at your peril.
She sounds like a killer, right enough - but can her ferocity be leashed to useful purpose? We shall have to see.

So you want great warriors? We have them aplenty. But let me tell you of one whose savagery even we find astonishing. Her name is Turmbathu - yes, a woman! I would not have believed it myself had I not seen her in the fighting pit with my own eyes. Defeated three men at once, and killed one of them. Unfortunate, that - the one she killed was a son of Great Lord Lurmsakun, and so now you may find her among the prisoners, awaiting a painful death… unless you, Commander, can intercede. Such a pity, to waste such strength.
So, the people here fancy themselves heirs of greatness, do they? Can anyone here stand proof of such claims?

You come at the wrong time, Commander. Now we’re all basking in the glory of capturing this holding, and working out the equitable distribution of its wealth - to put it another way, the captains are all at one another’s throats, heated words are being said, and it will not be long ere blood of Umbar is spilled by Umbar hands. Some of the sailors are unhappy, and may consent to follow you instead of their former captains. That’s the best I can do for you at the moment, Commander.
Disappointing. But not unexpected of sea-dogs. I shall have to look elsewhere for the quality I seek.
A corsair with a code of honour! Not unheard of, but not often found. I care only that he will go where I command, and kill as I instruct.

Why, if I guess aright you seek the finest fighters among us to join your ranks. After the recent burning of our Haven, I’m afraid our best sailors and raiders follow only our most experienced captains. But I have a friend, named Fuldimir, who has been passed over for promotion too many times, to my mind. It’s that strange way of thinking he has - he will not steal, he says, from any who still draw breath. Where’s the sense in that, I ask you? Still, he is handy with a cutlass, and as tough as any hardy seafarer. Here he is, in this tent - you may speak with him.
So, these are the finest in the Black Land, are they? Not much to look at. Tell me who’s actually useful in a scrap.

O ho, a mighty champion is here, I see! And of course, the mighty champion wants only the very best fighters, and no mistake! Well, well! Maybe you’ll find that some of the lads here have plans of their own, to rise high in the sight of the Eye. Maybe you’ll find Lugbúrz thinks a little better of them than of you. Won’t surprise me, ha! Why don’t you just go along to the barracks and requisition your troops like everyone else.
Oh, I’ll remember this slight, mark my words. Do me a good turn, and I’ll not forget it, but speak uncivilly to me, and you’ll soon see what I can do about that.
Well, I’ve struck a bit of luck at last, I see! You’ve done well. I’ll report your contribution.

You’ll want an Uruk for that, mark my words. The best fighters for sure in this sorry-looking lot. Now, if you’re looking for a trusty lad to watch your back in a fight, I’ll tell you straight: you’ll not find better than old Gorbag. Used to be a comrade of mine, before I got assigned here, a while after the Great Signal went up. Now that he’s off the patrol lists, he could join up with you right enough. He ought to be up there somewhere, by that big ruined Tower where the Bosses meet to talk sometimes. Looking down at the rest of these dunghill rats - he likes to do that, he does, ha!
我聽說這裡有偉大的戰士。他們在哪裡？誰值得加入我？

It is not accordant to our creed for our greatest to join with such as thee, O Commander. In the world, there are the great and the small; for soldiers such as ourselves, always we stand in this relation to one another. I counsel you to seek out those who could learn from you in battle; it is better not to try yoking a mighty stallion to a weakly-made plow, for the stallion would then destroy the plow, to the detriment of all.
如 果 我 理 解 正 確 ， 你 就 是 不 尊 重 我 。   我 會 記 住 這 個 。
我 知 道 了 。  我 希 望 萊 克 亞 達 的 戰 士 能 像 你 說 那 樣 偉 大 。

I heard a story around the fires: when the Black Serpent called his bannermen, who are some of our finest horse archers, many boasted of how all the treasures of the West would soon be theirs; but one whom we call Lykyada stood apart and remained silent. And when they asked him what he hoped to take from the West, he stooped, scooped up a handful of sand, and said, “What do I require that the land of my birth has not already given me? Behold, I make a gift to them of the sand on which I have stood.” And so saying, he let the wind from the east blow the sand away, into the west. Then all who heard this repented of their injudicious words, and swore to follow his lead. If he finds you worthy, Commander, he may follow yours. Look for him where he stands in attendance upon our chieftains.

All here at the Hornburg have their given duties, Commander - all save one, I should say. Maybe that one will ride out with you, for otherwise he should be lucky if another Éored will consent to have him! A drunken sot is our Ulfas - good cheer he brings to his comrades, and he is a skilled Rider, but loth is he to set down a tankard without first draining it! Look for him in the hall yonder, if that does not trouble you.
老人，我從傳說中的北方尋求著名的戰士，人類或精靈的幫助。

Look well, Commander. Before you is perhaps the last great muster of the North, in this Age and any Age hereafter. Man and Elf alike, we who have come here do not hope to return. From the Last Homely House we have come; from the vales and forests of Eriador the last of the Núnatani, whom you call Dúnedain, have come. Each of us has his appointed tasks - none may follow you as you wish, save that you exercise your writ and recruit from our garrison.
